title.part3: at the service of your SME or Startup.

valueProposition.quoteHighlight: that's what we do at Plano.

results.description: Clear KPIs and metrics that matter for your business

testimonials.title: Real
testimonials.subtitle: The word from those who have already trusted us

sofia.quote: From the start, the Plano team understood my vision and created a modern and functional website. Communication was excellent, they met deadlines and allowed updates. Recommended for those looking for quality and professionalism. Thank you, Plano!
sofia.author: Sofía Ubertino Rosso

juan.quote: Working with Plano was a great success in solving our digital needs. Their professionalism, commitment, and constant communication, as well as the personalized solutions provided, exceeded our expectations. Thank you Plano!
juan.author: Juan Manuel Tripi
juan.company: ICE - Electrical Engineering and Construction S.A.

lucas.quote: Plano digitized our barbershop with a modern and intuitive website. Now, our clients can easily book appointments at both branches, improving organization and experience. Great work and 100% recommended!
lucas.author: Lucas Ledesma

daniela.quote: We are very happy and satisfied with PLANO WEB's work. They understood exactly what we needed for our accounting firm and created a professional, modern, and easy-to-navigate website. Also, always attentive and resolute at every stage of the process. Thanks for empowering us and positioning us digitally in the market!
daniela.author: Daniela Chiaramonte

sergio.quote: Working with Plano was very agile, relaxed, and professional. Their methodology was key to achieving exactly what the company needed to convey. We achieved a website that represents us and transmits our identity perfectly. For the first time I was able to capture what I had in mind in the final product.
sergio.author: Sergio Scravaglieri

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.subtitle: We know your time is gold. That's why we work

brief.title: Brief

sprint.title: Sprint

results.details: Performance reports and KPIs that allow you to measure the real impact of the project.

methodology.ctaText: Ready to take the next step?

team.title: Who
team.subtitle: The team that makes it possible for SMEs and Startups to compete with cutting-edge technology

ignacio.name: Ignacio Quantin
ignacio.description: Expert in no-code development and automation. Specialized in creating scalable technological solutions that drive the growth of SMEs and Startups.

manuel.name: Manuel Ríos Velar
manuel.description: Comprehensive designer focused on branding and user experience. Creates visual identities that communicate value and connect brands with their audiences.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: To democratize access to quality technology so that any company, regardless of its size, can compete and grow in the digital world.

workTogether.title: Let's work together if...
workTogether.subtitle: If you identify with any of these situations, we are the perfect team for your project
reasons: You want to grow your business with a clear and professional digital presence.
You have manual internal processes and are looking to automate them to save time.
You know your brand needs a quality leap in design and identity.
You value working with a team that speaks plainly, without unnecessary jargon.
You want measurable and concrete results (more leads, lower costs, more efficiency).
You're motivated by the idea of a close technological partner, not just a provider.
You're open to innovating with no-code tools and artificial intelligence.
